entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
